Arushi Goel

Currently a Graduate Research Student. Passionate about computer vision, machine learning, and exploring - ideas, books and places.

  G. Scholar LinkedIn Github e-Mail

Me in a Nutshell

I am currently a second-year PhD student in the VICO group with Dr. Hakan Bilen at the School of Informatics, University of Edinburgh. I am also fortunate to work closely with Dr. Frank Keller and Dr. Basura Fernando.


Previously, I spend some wonderful years in Singapore working as a Research Engineer at A*STAR AI Initiative.


In my research, I am interested in solving problems related to long-tail recognition and few-shot/zero-shot learning for vision and language domain specific applications.

My broad research intrests also span very interesting and emerging research areas such as multi-modal emotion recognition, social relationship understanding, image captioning and multi-modal adversarial attacks.


I majored in electronics and communication engineering as a bachelor student, eventually finding passion for machine learning and it’s applications.

Feel free to drop me an email for research discussions, collaborations or just chatting!

What's new with me?

⭐️ [June 2021] !NEW! ♨️ ♨️ Excited to start as an Applied Scientist Intern at Amazon Alexa AI, Cambridge, UK.

⭐️ [June 2021] !NEW! ♨️ ♨️ Co-organized the Women in Computer Vision (WiCV) Workshop at CVPR 2021!

⭐️ [Mar 2021] Invited talk at CoSInE: Conference for Scientists, Innovators and Engineers on Ethics and Bias in AI.

⭐️ [July 2020] Our work accepted to the VIPriors Workshop at ECCV 2020.

⭐️ [Sept 2019] Awarded the Graduate Student Fellowship for my PhD studies by the School of Informatics, University of Edinburgh.

⭐️ [Sept 2019] Started my PhD at the University of Edinburgh! Scotland is beautiful.

⭐️ [June 2019] Attended CVPR-2019. Many interesting oral and poster sessions on Language and Reasoning, Recognition, and Few-Shot Learning.

⭐️ [February 2019] Our work on Social Relationship Recognition using Graphs accepted at CVPR, 2019. Thanks and congrats to Keng Teck and Cheston.

⭐️ [February 2019] Our work on predicting listener empathic responses over time accepted at 2019 14th IEEE International Conference on Automatic Face & Gesture Recognition (FG 2019).

⭐️ [December 2018] Won second position in the OMG-Empathy Prediction challenge. Check the Leaderboard for more information. Congrats to Desmond, Xuan and Son. Great team effort.

⭐️ [June 2018] Sponsored by A*STAR to attend the Machine Learning Summer School in Buenos Aires, Argentina. The most amazing two weeks of brainstorming and networking. Buenos Aires is definitely Bohemic!

⭐️ [January 2018] Started as a Research Engineer in Institute of High Performance Computing and A*STAR AI Initiative, Singapore.

⭐️ [August 2017] Succesfully completed my Bachelor Thesis from NTU and IIIT Allahabad with First Class Honours.

⭐️ [Jan 2017] Joined Nanyang Technological University, Singapore as a Research Assistant, under Prof. Lam Siew Kei. The main focus of the project was fast and efficient vehicle detection in videos.
